Ramphala_Anthracnose: Dark irregular brown spots; leaf margins dry and curl
Ramphala_Phoma_Leaf_Spot: Circular dark lesions with pale centers; premature leaf fall
Ramphala_Alternaria_Leaf_Blight: Brown concentric spots merging into blighted areas
Ramphala_Powdery_Mildew: White powder on young leaves; leaf curling
Lakshmanphala_Anthracnose: Circular brown or water-soaked spots; leaf tip blight
Lakshmanphala_Alternaria_Leaf_Blight: Brown concentric rings; yellowing and defoliation
Lakshmanphala_Powdery_Mildew: White coating on leaf surface; distortion of new growth
Lakshmanphala_Cercospora_Leaf_Blight: Tiny gray-brown circular spots, later merging into blotches
wood_apple_Alternaria_Leaf_Spot: Small brown spots with yellow halo, enlarging to blight
wood_apple_Anthracnose: Circular black sunken spots; leaf blight and twig dieback
wood_apple_Cercospora_Leaf_Blight: Minute gray spots with dark margins, coalescing to patches
wood_apple_Powdery_Mildew: White powdery film on leaves and young shoots
wood_apple_Sooty_Mold: Black soot-like layer on upper leaf surface
